inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: planning to undergo standard of care treatment with surgery and radiation therapy.

inclusion.criterion: not located in brainstem or deep midbrain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bone Marrow Function: peripheral absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1000/µl
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Renal Function: serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 times upper limit of institutional normal for age and/or GFR ≥ 70 mL/min/1.73 m2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hepatic Function: Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 times institutional normal; SGPT (ALT) < 3 times institutional normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent according to institutional guidelines must be obtained
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior or ongoing liver disease including known cirrhosis, hepatitis B or C infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients on immunosuppressive drugs (with exception of corticosteroid)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known history of HIV or underlying immunodeficiency
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with acute infections (viral, bacterial or fungal infections requiring therapy)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or breast-feeding patients. Female patients of childbearing age must have negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 1 week of beginning therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment with high-dose steroids, which may be considered immunosuppressive. However, the patient's overall condition and treatment plan suggest that they are likely ineligible for this trial.
